Title: Establishes the youth in progress advisory board for adolescents in foster care
Summary: Establishes the youth in progress advisory board and regional teams for adolescents in foster care to provide mentorship of youths in foster care; requires reporting.
LawCode: Add Art 6 Title 1-A ยง394, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing the youth in progress advisory board and regional teams for adolescents in foster care for the state
